summary.description:
Today, more moisture-laden rainfall (up 0.5 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 181 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 899 m), rainfall (down 0.2 mm), and inside temperature (up 1.7°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 181.0m lower than yesterday, 22.9m lower than the past week, 898.7m lower than the past month.

Yesterday’s cloud levels showed a low of 745m and a peak of 3580m, averaging 1805.4m; the week and month recorded warmer averages.
cloud levels.summary: Expect mostly clear skies with high cloud.

summary.summary: Inside; temperature should feel pleasantly mild. Outside; temperatures should feel nicely warm. Also, pleasant humidity levels. Moderate rainfall, mostly clear skies with high cloud, and very bright daylight. Low pressure may bring unsettled weather.
